edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.model
Class FileMetadata

java.lang.Object
  edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.model.FileMetadata
Direct Known Subclasses:
PDFFileMetadata
@Entity
public abstract class FileMetadata
extends java.lang.Object

A set of information about a file

Field Summary
private  int id
          The ID used to identify this object in the database
private  java.util.Date lastOpened
          The date of the last time the file was opened

Constructor Detail

FileMetadata

public FileMetadata()
Creates a new empty object. This is mostly here so that Hibernate can fill in all the data.

public FileMetadata(java.lang.String path)
Creates a new for the contents on disk with default initialization for the other fields.

Parameters:
path - the path to the file contents residing on disk

FileMetadata

public FileMetadata(java.util.Date date,
                    int timesOpened,
                    java.lang.String path,
                    java.util.Set<Tag> fileTags)
Creates a new FileMetadata with all its fields set to the given arguments

Parameters:
date - the last time this document was opened
timesOpened - the number of times this was opened
path - the path to the file contents residing on disk
fileTags - the tags to be applied to this file (This is NOT copied)
